original_text:
“‘And in the last days it shall be, God declares,
that I will pour out my Spirit on all flesh,
and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy,
    and your young men shall see visions,
    and your old men shall dream dreams;
korean_text: 하나님이 말씀하시기를 말세에 내가 내 영을 모든 육체에 부어 주리니 너희의 자녀들은 예언할 것이요 너희의 젊은이들은 환상을 보고 너희의 늙은이들은 꿈을 꾸리라

sentences.original_text: And in the last days it shall be,
that I will pour out my Spirit on all flesh,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 영을 모든 육체에 부으리니,

sentences.original_text: and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy,
and your young men shall see visions,
and your old men shall dream dreams;
